General.Name: Intermedia Capital Tbk
General.Description: PT Intermedia Capital Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides television broadcasting services in Indonesia. The company manages ANTV, a free-to-air television channel. It offers content that are focused on families, children, and entertainment. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Intermedia Capital Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Visi Media Asia Tbk.
General.Address: Komplek Rasuna Epicentrum Lot 9, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12940
